chapters.title: Gopher Spinach
chapters.description: Popeye tries to rid his garden of a gopher.

chapters.title: Out to Punch
chapters.description: Popeye is training for his boxing fight against Bluto.

chapters.title: Shuteye Popeye
chapters.description: Popeye the Sailor snores while he sleeps, which disturbs Mouse.

chapters.title: Popeye For President
chapters.description: Popeye and Bluto are both running for president.

chapters.title: Patriotic Popeye
chapters.description: Popeye's nephews want to play with fireworks on July 4th.

chapters.title: Taxi-Turvy
chapters.description: Popeye and Bluto both run a taxi service.

chapters.title: Ancient Fistory
chapters.description: A Cinderella like tale in which Olive is the princess and Popeye is the prince.

chapters.title: Assault and Flattery
chapters.description: Bluto is suing Popeye for assault.

chapters.title: Cookin' with Gags
chapters.description: Bluto plays all sorts of gags on Popeye and Olive on April Fool's Day.

chapters.title: Fright To The Finish
chapters.description: Popeye the Sailor and his arch enemy Bluto fight over Olive Oyl on Halloween.

chapters.title: Greek Mirthology
chapters.description: Popeye tells his four nephews the story of his great Uncle Hercules.

chapters.title: I don't Scare
chapters.description: Bluto bullies Popeye and attempts to sabotage Popeye's date with Olive.

chapters.title: Spree Lunch
chapters.description: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street.
